mapper.select: SELECT member_id memberId, department_no departmentNo, member_name memberName, member_address memberAddress, member_email memberEmail, member_birth memberBirth, member_gender memberGender, member_phone memberPhone, member_sign_file memberSignFile, member_rank memberRank, member_level memberLevel, member_hiredate memberHiredate FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
